title: Businessweek Talks- Raytheon CEO Greg Hayes
itunes:title: Businessweek Talks- Raytheon CEO Greg Hayes
description:
Greg Hayes, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer at Raytheon, discusses the aerospace business and the defense industry with Bloomberg Businessweek anchor Carol Massar in the latest edition of Businessweek Talks.

Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
